item.description:
Dorothy & Leroy's Southern Cuisine was suggested by one of our members. The Ambiance: Casual, Family Friendly cafeteria style dining. Order at the counter, pay the cashier (Mastercard or cash) and eat! I have heard wonderful things about the food! And there is plenty of parking.

NOTE: 6:30PM IS WHEN I'LL BE THERE, BUT DINERS CAN ARRIVE ANYTIME BETWEEN 6:30 AND 7:00PM.
BRING YOUR OWN WINE, BEER, ETC. - THEY DO NOT SERVE ALCOHOLIC BEVERAGES. THEY CLOSE
AT 8:00PM.

The review is at http://local.yahoo.co...

I made the reservation for 16 people, but more can come if they want to. So if this looks full, just put your name on the "Wait List" and come anyway - you should be able to get a table next to us.

Let's get some Southern chow, y'all. As always I will be collecting $1.00 per member to defray the Meetup costs. - Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Dorothy & Leroy's 06/17/09 6:30pm
